column5: Got out for a few hours this morning to try yet another pond. Biggest bite today was the one that swallowed my bobber as it hit the water. It was a big boil and it probably still has it in its gullet.  There were quite a few large WGSF around getting in the way.   There were also some 1/2 -1 1/2 lb bass to keep me entertained.   I'll have to work the other shore next time out.
Nice Bruce.  Love the red eye on the WGSF  Craig
Niagara has so many fishing opportunities. This is why I miss living there so much.
